meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Alison Shapiro Michele Myers Beuerlein Ashok Poozhikunnel Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6515.

td.p: Alison Shapiro, a publicist from Santa Monica, California
Michele Myers Beuerlein, a research assistant from Cincinnati, Ohio
Ashok Poozhikunnel, an underwriter from Wheaton, Illinois (whose 1-day cash winnings total $21,600)

tr.td: NEWSPAPERS
AFRICAN CITIES
MEN'S HAIRSTYLES
FILMS BY SUBTITLE
HISTORICAL QUOTES
"CAT" OR "DOG"?

div.h3: Scores at the end of the Jeopardy! Round:

tr.td: Ashok
Michele
Alison
LET ME PREFACE THAT
(Alex: In that category we want you to identify the author whose preface we quote.)
COMPLETE DOM-INATION
(Alex: Not "domination.")
POTPOURRI
(Alex: A little bit of everything.)
MUSICAL NUMBERS
I'M BURNIN' FOR YOU
10-LETTER WORDS

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
